::: {#hero-heading}
<div class="h1">Hey, I'm happy you're here</div>

I work at the Université de Lorraine in France in topics related to the mechanical and innovation management engineering. 

My research interests include applications of biomedical and spatial data science in the public and population health fields. 

I work on projects that aims to deep study the limits of the distributed recycling approach as a short-medium strategy for the plastic waste problem.   Learn more about my research interests in [publications](/publication).

Get in touch by [sending me a note](/contact.qmd)! {{< fa feather-pointed >}}

:::
